trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Fruita
There was one other sighting in Fruita on or around January 6th 2012
Summary: several of us saw ufos they wear orangeish red and wear above the monument. me and my friend saw 5 in all in about a 15 min period flying above the monument
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was about 7:45 me and my friend were out side talking when we noticed a yellowiah orange light in the sky to the south of us it apperd to be above the monument and was flying it flew in kind of a circle it was in the sky for a couple of mins and then disappeared a couple of mins latter another one showed up above the monument and went from left east to west above the monument and disappeared. A couple mins latter a couple people showed up and we saw two more at the same time flying up from around the monument and a they went up into the sky and disappeared. Then we saw one more seem to come up from around the base of the monument and went further into the sky then disappeared like the others. All of them looked about the same and none of them went straight they kind of went in there direction but not in a straight line and there was plains in the sky at that time. It was amazing blew me away.
